UniprotID	Q13137
Accession	Q13137;B2RBT0;B4DDC4;B4DDT4;B4DP36;B4E0C0;E7ENK0;E7ETP5;E9PBE5;Q53FQ5;Q53HB5;Q6IBN9;Q9BTF7
EntryName	CACO2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Calcium-binding and coiled-coil domain-containing protein 2 (Antigen nuclear dot 52 kDa protein) (Nuclear domain 10 protein NDP52) (Nuclear domain 10 protein 52) (Nuclear dot protein 52)
GeneName	CALCOCO2 NDP52
Length	446
Function	Xenophagy-specific receptor required for autophagy-mediated intracellular bacteria degradation. Acts as an effector protein of galectin-sensed membrane damage that restricts the proliferation of infecting pathogens such as Salmonella typhimurium upon entry into the cytosol by targeting LGALS8-associated bacteria for autophagy (PubMed:22246324). Initially orchestrates bacteria targeting to autophagosomes and subsequently ensures pathogen degradation by regulating pathogen-containing autophagosome maturation (PubMed:23022382, PubMed:25771791). Bacteria targeting to autophagosomes relies on its interaction with MAP1LC3A, MAP1LC3B and/or GABARAPL2, whereas regulation of pathogen-containing autophagosome maturation requires the interaction with MAP3LC3C (PubMed:23022382, PubMed:25771791). May play a role in ruffle formation and actin cytoskeleton organization and seems to negatively regulate constitutive secretion (PubMed:17635994).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Perinuclear region; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Autophagosome membrane
Disorder	0.6227,0.5620,0.4619,0.3529,0.2575,0.2988,0.3087,0.2364,0.2503,0.1583,0.1791,0.2328,0.1611,0.0967,0.0454,0.0835,0.0835,0.0518,0.0506,0.0424,0.0214,0.0141,0.0113,0.0174,0.0281,0.0494,0.0494,0.0349,0.0605,0.0389,0.0765,0.0454,0.0433,0.0327,0.0555,0.1184,0.1048,0.0555,0.0531,0.0555,0.0568,0.1092,0.1643,0.2470,0.1373,0.0888,0.0888,0.0531,0.0414,0.0398,0.0433,0.0473,0.0443,0.0405,0.0835,0.0835,0.0780,0.0909,0.1048,0.1028,0.0888,0.0483,0.0414,0.0244,0.0165,0.0287,0.0281,0.0327,0.0327,0.0690,0.0433,0.0704,0.0749,0.1251,0.1323,0.1137,0.1048,0.1115,0.1048,0.1759,0.1942,0.1969,0.2002,0.2193,0.2951,0.2783,0.2002,0.2034,0.2034,0.2645,0.2680,0.3529,0.3529,0.2645,0.2002,0.2064,0.1399,0.0929,0.0555,0.0356,0.0349,0.0568,0.0592,0.1092,0.0799,0.0631,0.0985,0.1528,0.2002,0.1731,0.1251,0.1373,0.0719,0.0676,0.0605,0.0948,0.1092,0.1969,0.2951,0.3807,0.4582,0.4582,0.3774,0.2988,0.2399,0.2436,0.3053,0.3149,0.3117,0.3392,0.3529,0.3631,0.3460,0.4541,0.3840,0.4901,0.4979,0.4725,0.4766,0.4507,0.4507,0.3740,0.2884,0.3460,0.4256,0.5017,0.5665,0.5807,0.5017,0.4901,0.5055,0.4940,0.4801,0.4051,0.3948,0.4051,0.3948,0.3807,0.3774,0.3774,0.3872,0.3948,0.4476,0.5254,0.5176,0.5176,0.4409,0.4409,0.4186,0.4725,0.4831,0.4766,0.4831,0.4979,0.5901,0.5901,0.5951,0.5901,0.6136,0.5296,0.5342,0.5176,0.4831,0.4441,0.4541,0.4119,0.3910,0.3983,0.3840,0.4087,0.4186,0.4087,0.4149,0.3460,0.3249,0.3249,0.3249,0.3948,0.3460,0.2918,0.3529,0.2884,0.2918,0.3117,0.3667,0.3704,0.4256,0.4292,0.4801,0.4979,0.4901,0.5017,0.5342,0.5254,0.5854,0.6991,0.6906,0.6043,0.5854,0.5854,0.6755,0.6712,0.6712,0.6806,0.6531,0.6531,0.5665,0.5707,0.5901,0.5901,0.5951,0.5807,0.5758,0.5577,0.5533,0.5577,0.5017,0.4441,0.5055,0.5176,0.5951,0.5707,0.5951,0.6620,0.6661,0.6906,0.6948,0.6851,0.6906,0.6851,0.6136,0.5951,0.5951,0.5992,0.6183,0.6269,0.6661,0.6661,0.6322,0.5620,0.5620,0.4901,0.4940,0.4901,0.5017,0.4901,0.4766,0.4901,0.5577,0.5382,0.5296,0.5296,0.5533,0.5620,0.5577,0.4801,0.4766,0.4582,0.5017,0.5807,0.6576,0.6755,0.7547,0.7547,0.7
